Title: Relates to designating a small business liaison
Summary: Provides that the departments of agriculture and markets, environmental conservation, labor, transportation and taxation and finance shall designate an existing employee to serve as its liaison to small businesses regulated by such department; further provides the duties of such small business liaison.
LawCode: Add ยง102-b, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to designating a small business liaison
